snippet: A bus plunged 400 feet into a gorge on Thursday in western India after the driver lost control, killing at least 30 people, the police said.
abstract: Bus plunges 400 feet into a gorge in western India, killing at least 30 people.
lead_paragraph: A bus plunged 400 feet into a gorge on Thursday in western India after the driver lost control, killing at least 30 people, the police said.

headline.main: India: At Least 30 Die in Bus Crash
headline.print_headline: India: At Least 30 Die in Bus Crash
